According study design , subject divide three group base periodontal parameter . Patients suffer chronic periodontitis form group 1 ( n : 20 ) , patient plaque induced gingivitis form group 2 ( n:20 ) periodontal healthy patient insert group 3 ( n:20 ) . After gently dry area , GCF sample filter paper use intracrevicular method ( Periopaper , ProFlow , Inc. , Amityville , New York , USA ) .Two milliliter ( ml ) peripheral blood collect individual sterile syringe antecubital fossa venipuncture , separate serum component sample centrifuge 3000g 5 min , immediately store −40°C assay . The quantity Fetuin-A SAA protein concentration sample analyze sandwich enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) procedures use commercially available kit . The Spearman 's rank correlation test use detect relationship GCF serum SAA Fetuin-A GI CAL . All test perform use statistical software ( SPSS Inc. , version 22.0 , Chicago , IL , USA ) . The mean ± standard deviation mean rank value calculate parameter , base patient statistical unit . P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
